::Skulletron::

	"Well, I have two stories.  The first one they might not believe as well
as the second.  Anyway my first story is that I was born here and I never
joined any factions, and I found my destiny in the maximals, or I can say
that I just landed in a pod, and go ask to join the Maximals.  If I choose
my first story, then it would be better if we didn't go in the base at the
same time.  Which story sounds better to you, pussy cat?" Skulletron said,
grinning.
